text: State of the Union is a 1948 American drama movie directed by Frank Capra and was based on the play of the same name by Howard Lindsay and Russel Crouse. It stars Spencer Tracy, Katharine Hepburn, Van Johnson, Angela Lansbury, Irving Bacon, Frank Mayo, Lewis Stone, Adolphe Menjou and was distributed by Metro- Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1948 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Frank Capra
title: State of the Union (movie)
